A4.text: The capital and largest city of both England and the UK is London.

A5.text: Cardiff is the national capital of Wales.

A6.text: England is a country that is part of the United Kingdom.

A7.text: The Acts of Union brought into effect a political union with the Kingdom of Scotland that created the Kingdom of Great Britain.
